ESSENTIAL NUTRIENTS DURING PREGNANCY 
Folic acid 
Folic acid, a B-vitamin crucial for DNA synthesis and cell 
division, is particularly important during pregnancy. It 
helps in the formation of the neural tube, which develops 
into the brain and spinal cord. Insufficient folic acid intake 
is strongly associated with neural tube defects (NTDs) 
such as spina bifida and anencephaly.1
